questions.prompt: Which of the following is an example of supervised learning?
options: Training a model to classify emails as spam or not spam using labeled data
Randomly assigning labels to data points

questions.prompt: In one or two sentences, define an API.
questions.answer: An API (Application Programming Interface) is a defined set of rules or contracts that allow one software component to communicate with another, usually via exposed functions or HTTP endpoints.

questions.prompt: Explain why using version control systems like Git is important in software development projects.
questions.answer: Version control systems like Git allow tracking changes over time, collaborating safely across multiple developers, creating branches for features, rolling back mistakes, and maintaining a clear history of the project. They improve teamwork, reliability, and reproducibility of the codebase.
